text:
Hello everyone <!here>,

I have something I would love to hear your feedback on: <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vcFe9E5_P44&index=4&list=PLwia5ezffHz7GLSDx27yxHn4ueIct4j9u>

I'm interested in any thoughts you have but mostly:
- is the video/sound quality sufficient or annoyingly bad?
- did you feel like you could follow along or was it confusing?
- would you be interested in the next demo?

Thanks a lot for taking the time :smiley:

attachments.title: zells - prototype eight - demo 4
attachments.fallback: YouTube Video: zells - prototype eight - demo 4
attachments.video_html: <iframe width="400" height="225" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/vcFe9E5_P44?feature=oembed&autoplay=1&iv_load_policy=3" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

text:
Hi Nikolas,
the quality is really good. Your voice is easy to understand and the background noises aren't annoying in my opinion. I was able to follow along quite well, but I think I didn't get "the greater picture". Maybe I should have watched the earlier demos, but I was missing an initial motivation (mostly which problems you want to solve and a general description of your idea/approach). The stuff you showed is really cool, but from the demo I don't know how that could be useful for me. The visualization of messages being sent between nodes is neat. I think that for demos you could slow that down even more so that it's easier to understand what's going on. And yep, I'd watch another demo :wink:
